stack: File Hosting & Delivery: AWS S3 or Cloudflare
features: **Artwork Hosting & Showcasing:** Artists can upload digital art and organize their portfolio in various categories and collections.
**Secure & Copyright-protected Uploads:** Artworks will be automatically watermarked and protected using copyright protection APIs.
**Shopping Cart & Transactions:** Customers can browse, select, and purchase artworks through a built-in shopping cart.
**Secure Payments:** Integrating Stripe or PayPal will enable artists to securely receive payments for their work.
**Automated Delivery:** Once the transaction is complete, the purchased artworks will be delivered to the customer via email or direct download link.
**Analytics:** Provide artists with performance metrics such as page views, sales, and customer demographics.
**Mobile-responsive:** Ensure the platform is optimized for mobile devices.
